name: Embraced By Green
description:
"existence"

In Embraced By Green working as researchers for the Yukiyama City institute, you and your colleague Yumiko are out in the botanical garden one morning. It's nine o'clock and everything is quiet and peaceful.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2006-11-21. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Music was composed by base and mikey. Estimated completion time is 30 minutes.

Embraced By Green is game Nr. 11 of the Original 22.
